resources.string: Health Connect is installed on this device. Use the menu to explore the sample, with each screen demonstrating a different aspect of Health Connect functionality.
Health Connect is supported on this device, but is either not installed, or requires an update.
To use this sample, please install or update the Health Connect package via Google Play.
Health Connect is only supported on Android devices running API level _SDK_ or above.
Please visit the Health Connect guides to learn more about device compatibility and using Health Connect.
